item.description:
I've been exceptionally busy, but want to take a night out to go to a new restaurant in Hartford.  ZULA Restaurant is located on the corner of Pratt and Main and has a great $23.00 4-course menu for the "Taste of Hartford" event.  I want the Mussells appetizer, Summer salad, Cod entree, and Tiramasu dessert!! What do you want? To see the menu go to: http://www.zulact.com/images/taste-of-hartford-menu.pdf 

Also, it's Happy Hour at the bar, so I am going a few minutes early to order my drink to take to the table ($3.00 wine, $3.50 Drafts, $5.00 martini of the day). To see their website (turn down your volume first!) go to: http://www.zulact.com/#/HOME-01-00/

From the Hartford Advocate: Zula's beer selection has some appealing out-of-left-field options...potent Belgian ales, organic wheat beers, and even a Spanish lager, in addition to the standard American brews. The menu is wisely focused, fitting on one page. Mediterranean, Asian and classic elements mingle comfortably...  To see this review go to:
http://www.hartfordadvocate.com/entertainment/dining/ht-dining-out-zula-bar-and-restaurant-20110504,0,7837644.story

As always, you will be expected to show up on time if you RSVP "YES".  Please do not change to "NO" less than 30 hours prior as I have to confirm the # in our party the day before. I will collect $1.00 each for costs of the group.

Hope to see you there! - Betsy

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: ZULA Restaurant 08/10/11 6:60pm
